name: WELLS FARGO BANK, NA v. John DOE, Robin Nixon and Raymond Pratt. Petition of Robin Nixon

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of November, 2014, the “Emergency” Petition for Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
